channel.title: Our Transparency Blog
channel.description: In 2007, we decided to make all organization materials public, including communications, photo documentation and meeting notes. In addition, this is where we will post updates, funding requests and copies of pertinent documents here.

item.title: From Globaleyes to Running Chicken
item.description: We are rebooting this site! We have changed our name, are redesigning the logo, and setting up new fundraisers. We are still the same organization - working to help support the efforts of the Childrenâ€™s Rescue Mission, health initiatives and job-training for widows in Kisumu, Kenya. Our goal is still to be a transparent organization, so you can see how decisions are made and how money is used. We will continue to post photo updates from Kenya.
